pt: {sc}voracious{/sc} {sc}gluttonous{/sc} {sc}ravenous{/sc} {sc}rapacious{/sc} mean excessively greedy. {sc}voracious{/sc} applies especially to habitual gorging with food or drink.
{sc}gluttonous{/sc} applies to one who delights in eating or acquiring things especially beyond the point of necessity or satiety.

pt.t: an admiral who was {it}gluttonous{/it} for glory

pt: {sc}ravenous{/sc} implies excessive hunger and suggests violent or grasping methods of dealing with food or with whatever satisfies an appetite.

pt.t: a nation with a {it}ravenous{/it} lust for territorial expansion

pt: {sc}rapacious{/sc} often suggests excessive and utterly selfish acquisitiveness or avarice.

shortdef: marked by or given to gluttony
